Interface ec.ifc.app.ECKeyFilter 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Interface ec.ifc.app.ECKeyFilter

public interface ECKeyFilter
extends Object
Interface ECRootView uses to check whether the focused view wants to handle certain keys, such as the return key.

wantsEscapeKey()
ECRootView calls this on the focused view when the escape key is pressed.
wantsReturnKey()
ECRootView calls this on the focused view when the return key is pressed.

wantsReturnKey 
  public abstract boolean wantsReturnKey()
ECRootView calls this on the focused view when the return key is pressed. If the focused view returns false, the return key is used to activate the default button (if any), and the focused view will not receive a keyDown message.
See Also:
ECRootView
wantsEscapeKey 
  public abstract boolean wantsEscapeKey()
ECRootView calls this on the focused view when the escape key is pressed. If the focused view returns false, the escape key is used to activate the cancel button (if any), and the focused view will not receive a keyDown message.
See Also:
ECRootView
